items.title: O’Pinion: Notre Dame Football Has Itself to Blame for CFP Absence
items.summary: Welp… This sucks.  First things first, be honest. You. Yes, you, as a Notre Dame fan. In your heart of hearts, you KNOW that Miami deserved a spot in the CFP ahead of the Irish. The resumes are similar enough that the head-to-head win rightfully carried the day. The double-standard of the 1993 national championship […]

items.title: Reasons why Notre Dame should decline ANY bowl invitation
items.summary: Notre Dame fans are still a little shocked after today’s final college football playoff rankings that pushed the Irish back to #11 and OUT of the playoff. There is still plenty of time to slam the committee, scientologists, drug lords, and whoever else you want for this snubbing — but there is some business at […]

items.title: Notre Dame is OUT of the College Football Playoff
items.summary: The college football playoff committee is the most corrupt body in all of sports (and with FIFA that’s saying something). As the playoff rankings were unveiled we saw no movement in the top 8, and then it got ridiculous. Notre Dame is OUT of the college football playoff. Alabama, who was just blown out by […]

items.title: Notre Dame Fan Discussion: Conference Championship Weekend
items.summary: The college football regular season is over and done, and here comes the postseason. Obviously as an Independent, Notre Dame won’t be participating this weekend, but the impact from some of those games could be massive. There are multiple scenarios that have the Irish IN and OUT of the college football playoff due to certain […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Stats: The ACC-Notre Dame Team Comparison
items.summary: This part of the ACC-Notre Dame stats series is focused on team-level stats. Offense Points Scored The Irish would’ve been ranked first in the ACC for points scored per game. The team averaged 42 points per game during the 2025-26 season. Pitt (8-4) was a ways off at #2 with 35.1 points scored per game. Stanford […]

items.title: EARNED 5-STAR PODCAST: Notre Dame and the College Football Playoff Conspiracy
items.summary: Joshua and Jude celebrate Brendan’s birthday by opening the pod portal without him, because the Notre Dame Football universe doesn’t stop. In this episode: And MUCH more weaved inand out of the show.  Please RATE and REVIEW! All reviews left on Apple Podcasts will be read on the next Earned 5-Star Podcast. Go Irish!
